attributes.action: open a discussion within Parliament with regards to the pros and cons of banning tobacco.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We would like a discussion to be opened where politicians debate whether tobacco should be banned or not.  It will be an opportunity for anti-smokers to highlight the dangers or smoking and the benefits of banning it, whilst also allowing pro-smokers to justify why it should be allowed.
